amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that if a homeowner who has had a mortgage modified in a bankruptcy proceeding sells the home at a profit, the lender can recapture the amount of principal lost in the modification.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-21 to provide that if a homeowner who has had a mortgage modified in a bankruptcy proceeding sells the home at a profit, the lender can recapture the amount of principal lost in the modification.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 218 (Roll no. 101).
